title: "DECRACKERFICATION"
itunes:title: "DECRACKERFICATION"
description:
In this episode, Charlamagne looks back on the process of denazification and its effects on Germany while teaching our viewers how to decrackerfy America one institution at a time. We’re not telling you what to do, but we are planting the seed of what can be done.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
